title: 13.4.4 SOC 2 readiness checklist
body:
# Objective
Prepare Cloud Optimizer for SOC 2 Type I compliance by implementing required security controls and documentation.

## Requirements
- Conduct SOC 2 gap analysis
- Implement access controls and MFA
- Set up audit logging for all systems
- Implement data encryption (at rest and in transit)
- Create security policies and procedures
- Implement change management process
- Set up incident response plan
- Configure backup and disaster recovery
- Implement vendor management program
- Document system architecture and data flows
- Conduct employee security training
- Prepare for SOC 2 audit

## Acceptance Criteria
- Gap analysis completed with remediation plan
- All security controls implemented
- Policies and procedures documented
- Audit logs capturing all required events
- Encryption implemented everywhere
- Incident response plan tested
- Backup and DR tested successfully
- All documentation ready for auditor
- Internal audit passed
- SOC 2 Type I audit scheduled

## Dependencies
- Parent: Epic 13 (#131)
- Requires: #152 (Secrets Manager), #162 (Pen testing)
- Related: #137 (EULA and documentation)

## Estimated Effort
**Story Points:** 21
**Time:** 4 weeks
**Complexity:** Very High
